index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for administration of the Community Development Block Grant Program for the grant year commencing July 1, 1977 through December 31, 1977; establishing certain positions for the administration of said program in the Executive Department, Office of Policy Planning, the Departments of Community Development, Public Health, Human REsources and Finance; increasing certain Objects of Expenditure in the 1977 Budgets of said Departments and the Engineering Department; authorizing interdepartmental and other agreements for effectuation of said Program; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund; making an appropriation for administrative costs from the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund; and allocating appropriated funds to City Departments; and declaring the Emergency therefor.
